name: Jeremy Yallop
content: Jeremy Yallop Jeremy Yallop Associate Professor, Computer Laboratory, University of Cambridge Fellow & Director of Studies, Robinson College Email: jeremy.yallop@cl.cam.ac.uk Room: FS17 Openings Enquiries from potential MPhil and PhD students are welcome. My MPhil/Part III project proposals can be found here (local access only). The departmental website has some information about PhD applications.
